column1: Instructions are one sheet however the inclusion although helpful is really not needed on this occasion. You can see where the ministands need to go from the picture on the packaging.

3 pieces make up the mini stand. A DBG 2x2 plate, a smooth stepped curve piece, also 2x2 and a modified vertical plate. I have used these pieces this way before and I have to admit it is very effective. Good way to use them in the future for different displays!
Unfortunately no minifigures come with the stand. It would have been nice to get one with the stand even if it was not an exclusive. Might have encouraged more people to buy it.
Simple and easy and not much to it. This is not a set for building, it is a simple display frame with under 50 pieces that make up the mini stands the minifigures go onto.

Does look effective once all built and your own minifigures are added. Here is a quick snap from my instagram account UK BRiCKS. Please not the frame does not have a front cover to it to protect the minifigures.

I think this is ideal for kids who want easy access to their figures, it does not have a glass or plastic front so you can gain access quickly and easily. You can also pose you figures as their is no front to the frame and also add accessories to you minifigures.
